summary: The Department of Defense is one of the nation's largest employers, with almost 3 million military and civilian employees and $205 billion in contracts for services. This testimony discusses our work on DOD's workforce issues. Specifically, we've looked at ways to address: Military recruitment and retention challenges Shortfalls in strategic planning for the civilian workforce DOD's lack of information about the contract workforce to make...
title: Defense Workforce: Opportunities for more Effective Management and Efficiencies
